fields.description: Happy hour from 3:00pm to 6:00pm includes $1 off appetizers, $1 off beer, $1 off wine, and $1 off liquor.
Happy hour from 2:00pm to 7:00pm includes $5 wells, $4 craft drafts, $3 domestic drafts, $2 PBR 12oz can, and $6 chicken quesadilla.

Happy hour from 4:00pm to 6:00pm (at the bar only) includes 2-for-1 Kirin, $6 house red wine, $6 house white wine, $5 house cold sake, $2 off all tap cocktails, $3 steamed edamame, $5 spicy tuna & crispy rice.

Happy hour from 5:00pm to 6:00pm includes seasonal specials (subject to change). Menu items have included $9 Husk Punch, $10 Husk Old Fashioned cocktails, $5 Avondale 'Mosey' Lager, $10 hickory-smoked wings, $9 pimento cheese with Benne wafers, and a $15 Husk cheeseburger.
Happy hour from 5:00pm to 7:00pm includes $8-$9 classic cocktails, $6 select house wines, $5 highlighted draft beers.
Happy hour from 4:00pm to 6:00pm includes $8 martinis, $5 wines, and $1.50-$5 select bites.
Happy hour from 4:30pm to 6:30pm includes $6 Tennessee Whiskey of the day, $7 classic cocktails, $9 draft beer and well shot, and $5-$7 appetizer specials.
Happy hour from 5:00pm to 6:00pm includes $6 cocktails, $6 house wines, $5 drafts, and $1-$7 select bites.
Happy hour from 5:00pm to 6:00pm includes $5 house wines, $5 draft beer, and 2-for-1 Busch Light.
Happy hour from 4:00pm to 6:00pm includes $2 off beer, $2 off wine, $8 select cocktails, and $3-$7 select bites
Happy hour from 5:00pm to 7:00pm includes $8 Sapporo + hot chicken bun or pork bun.
Happy hour all day includes $1 off draft beers and $5 well drinks.
Happy hour noon until 8:00 pm.  All draft beers $3, all well drinks $4.
Happy hour 4:00 pm-8:00 pm includes 2 for 1 beers and well drinks and 1/2 off bottles of wine.
